text: This table summarizes a selection of jumps: Command Effeect fcowntle ~ Jumptolinenumber /Ipattern<CR> /?pattern<CR>/n /N Jump to next/previous occurrence of pattern % Jump to matching parenthesis (/) Jump to start of previous/next sentence {/} Jump to start of previous/next paragraph H/mM/L Jump to top/middle/bottom of screen gf Jump to file name under the cursor <C-1> Jump to definition of keyword under the cursor '{mark} / *{mark} Jump to a mark
